seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience with 4-5 years relevant experience, which aligns with senior level in data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL, and data processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Mandatory skills include ETL tools, Azure Databricks, and responsibilities mention batch processing alongside real-time, but ETL is emphasized

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, team leadership, or architectural oversight; role focuses on implementation and collaboration

primary_cloud.evidence: Job title specifies 'Azure', and mandatory skills include Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, and Azure Blob

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in skills or responsibilities

processing_paradigm.evidence: Responsibilities explicitly mention both batch and real-time processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps is listed as mandatory, which is a cloud-native orchestration tool for Azure environments

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Blob (data lake) and Azure Databricks (lakehouse/warehouse) are both mentioned, indicating mixed storage patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restricted to Kochi, Kerala, India, indicating regional requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: Only India (IN) is allowed per geo restrictions, indicating country-specific focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model with specific location (Kochi, Kerala, India) implies relocation may be required if not already based there

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and location is in India, suggesting no H1B sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization likely required for India location, and no mention of student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies local work authorization required, but no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent employment type suggests W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in extraction results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'growth opportunities' implicitly through collaboration and innovation, but no specific career tracks or progression paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with diverse teams including scientists, engineers, and consultants, suggesting collaborative learning environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions or advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, etc.) mentioned in job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed are 'must have' with no 'nice to have' skills, and specific experience and education requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering with specific tools and responsibilities outlined

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Azure Databricks, PySpark, SQL, etc.) are reasonable for a senior data engineer with 6-7 years experience
